user_prompt: Create output/report.json from input/sales.csv with keys total_amount (int), max_region (string), and num_rows (int). Then append DONE:finance-quarterly-rollup to workspace/checklist.txt.

Read input/issues.json and write output/high_open_ids.txt containing only HIGH severity issues with status OPEN, sorted ascending by id, one id per line. Then append DONE:bug-triage-filter to workspace/checklist.txt.
Read input/changes.txt and write output/stats.json with exact counts for FEAT, FIX, DOC, CHORE prefixes. Then append DONE:change-prefix-count to workspace/checklist.txt.

seed_files.input/changes.txt:
FEAT: add exports
FIX: null guard
DOC: add faq
CHORE: bump deps
FEAT: add cache
FIX: race condition

user_prompt: Read input/inventory.csv and write output/reorder.json with key reorder_skus (array of sku strings) where stock < reorder_point, sorted lexicographically. Then append DONE:inventory-reorder to workspace/checklist.txt.

seed_files.input/inventory.csv:
sku,stock,reorder_point
SKU-1,15,10
SKU-2,2,5
SKU-3,9,9
SKU-4,1,4
SKU-5,0,1

user_prompt: Read input/tickets.json and write output/sla.json with keys breach_ids (sorted list) and breach_count. A breach is resolution_hours > 24. Then append DONE:support-sla-audit to workspace/checklist.txt.

Read input/config_old.json and write output/config_new.json with this structure: {service:{name,timeout_seconds},runtime:{retry},flags:{safe_mode}}. Then append DONE:config-migration to workspace/checklist.txt.

Read input/docs.txt (format: file|status) and write output/publish_queue.txt with files whose status is not done, sorted alphabetically, one per line. Then append DONE:publish-queue to workspace/checklist.txt.
Read input/incidents.csv and write output/incidents_summary.json with keys critical_open, high_open, and closed_total. Then append DONE:incident-open-summary to workspace/checklist.txt.

seed_files.input/incidents.csv:
id,severity,status
I-1,CRITICAL,OPEN
I-2,HIGH,OPEN
I-3,HIGH,OPEN
I-4,HIGH,CLOSED
I-5,CRITICAL,CLOSED
